title: mAmava madhurApuri
sahitya:
mAmava madhurApuri rANi malayadhvaja rAjapUjita mAlini


anupallavi

  sOmAnala ravi nayana prakAshini kAma janani (amba) vara shyAmala rUpiNi


caraNam    kaushika muninuta kOdaNDarAma vAsavagini paramEsha ulhAsini
dAsajana hrdaya dhvAntam amba surEsha tanaya samsEvita bhAmini
